vote.title: Authorize a Local Project Advance Funding Agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation (TxDOT) (CSJ No. 0918-47-286) and payment to TxDOT for engineering review and construction administration services for the design and construction of the Uptown McKinney Avenue/Cole Avenue Couplet (also known as McKinney Avenue/Cole Avenue Two-way Conversion) in the amount of $69,700.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
vote.description: Authorize a Local Project Advance Funding Agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation (TxDOT) (CSJ No. 0918-47-286) and payment to TxDOT for engineering review and construction administration services for the design and construction of the Uptown McKinney Avenue/Cole Avenue Couplet (also known as McKinney Avenue/Cole Avenue Two-way Conversion) in the amount of $69,700.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
